name: Italian Sausage Tortellini Soup
author: Tim Smith
summary: This is the best soup I have ever had. It has lots of vegetables, Italian sausage, and even tortellini. Soup is one of my favorite foods and this one tops the list.
ingredients: 1 (3.5 ounce) link sweet Italian sausage, casings removed
2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese for topping
directions: Place the sausage in a large pot over medium high heat and saute for 10 minutes, or until well browned
Drain the fat except for about 1 tablespoon, add the onions and garlic and saute for 5 more minutes
Next add the beef stock, water, wine, tomatoes, carrots, basil, oregano and tomato sauce
Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes, skimming any fat that may surface
Add the zucchini, tortellini, green bell pepper and parsley to taste
Simmer for 10 minutes, or until tortellini is fully cooked
Pour into individual bowls and garnish with the cheese
